translation.zh: 总统先生 我不想通过埃莉出名

translation.en: What do you know about E.L.E.?
translation.zh: 你对埃莉有何了解？

translation.en: I know you should have picked a better cover story than a sick wife.
translation.zh:
我知道你应该找一个
比生病太太更好的理由

translation.en: See? What did I tell you?
translation.zh: 你看 我就说过

translation.en: We'd always thought the deadline for going public was the publication of the budget,
translation.zh: 我们想在预算日时 再对公众公布

translation.en: since we've spent more money than we can hide.
translation.zh:
因为我们花了很多钱
已经藏不住了

translation.en: The budget comes out in two weeks.
translation.zh: 预算两周后公布

translation.en: I don't suppose I could convince you to sit on this for two weeks.
translation.zh: 我想我不能说服你再等两周吧？

translation.en: No such thing as two weeks in the news business.
translation.zh: 在新闻业里没有两周之说

translation.en: And I can't appeal to your sense of what's in the nation's best interest?
translation.zh:
我不能唤醒你的良心
以国家利益为重吗？

translation.en: I always thought the truth was in the nation's best interest.
translation.zh:
我总是认为报道真相
就是以国家利益为重

translation.en: [Entrekin] You want to hold her?
translation.zh: 你想等一下再报道吗？

translation.en: [President Beck] What if we go public in 48 hours? Now, that's doable, isn't it?
translation.zh:
48小时后见报怎么样？
这切实可行 是不是？

translation.en: [Entrekin] That would be very difficult, Mr. President.
translation.zh: 这很困难

translation.en: [President Beck] Morton, if she knows, how long can it be
translation.zh: 莫顿 如果她知道

translation.en: before CNN or The Post breaks the story?
translation.zh:
有线电视新闻网或《邮报》
会等多久再报道这件事？

translation.en: This was never gonna be a secret as long as you wanted it to be.
translation.zh: 只要那样的话 这就不是秘密了

translation.en: Give us two days, Miss Lerner.
translation.zh: 再给我们两天吧 莱纳女士

translation.en: You'll get second-row center at the White House press conference.
translation.zh:
在白宫新闻发布会上
你会坐在中央第二排

translation.en: Now, from what I know of your career, that's a promotion.
translation.zh: 就我所知 你这是高升了

translation.en: I want exclusivity. Now, listen, young lady.
translation.zh:
-我想要独家报道
-听着 年轻女士

translation.en: This is a presidential favor.
translation.zh: 这是总统的优待

translation.en: I'm letting you go because I don't want another headache.
translation.zh:
我让你走
因为我不想再为这件事烦恼

translation.en: And I'm trusting you because I know what this can do for your career.
translation.zh:
我信任你
我知道这对你的职业生涯有好处

translation.en: It might seem that we have each other over the same barrel, Miss Lerner,
translation.zh:
这看起来似乎
我们都受到同样的制约

translation.en: but it just seems that way.
translation.zh: 可是这只是表面现象

translation.en: -I want the-- -"Want"?
translation.zh:
-我要…
-什么？

translation.en: May I...
translation.zh: 我可以…

translation.en: May I have the first question?
translation.zh: 我可以首先提问吗？

translation.en: We'll see you Tuesday, Miss Lerner.
translation.zh: 我们星期二见 莱纳女士

translation.en: Come on, come on.
translation.zh: 快啊

translation.en: E.L.E., E.L.E. E...
translation.zh: 埃莉

translation.en: Paleontology.
translation.zh: 古生物学？这跟古生物学有何关系？

translation.en: Paleontology. What's paleontology have to do with anything?
translation.zh: 古生物学？这跟古生物学有何关系？ （无其它匹配项）

translation.en: Come on. Come on, come on.
translation.zh: 拜托 （加州大学伯克利分校）

translation.en: -[Beth] Hey. -Hey.
translation.zh:
-嗨
-嗨

translation.en: -Look who's working late. -Yep.
translation.zh:
-瞧谁在加班
-是啊

translation.en: How's Rittenhouse going? Uh, no sign of the wife yet.
translation.zh:
-里顿豪斯怎么样了？
-还没有他太太的踪影

translation.en: -Is she missing? -No. We're still working on it.
translation.zh:
-她失踪了吗？
-没有 我们还在找

translation.en: -We'll get there. -I know, it's a dull story.
translation.zh:
-会找到的
-这个故事没意思

translation.en: I promise you, next time we'll get you something more exciting.
translation.zh: 下次我们给你个有趣的

translation.en: Great.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: -Are you okay? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-你没事吧？
-没事

translation.en: Want to come to dinner with us? I can't, I can't. I got... I have plans.
translation.zh:
-想跟我们一起吃饭吗？
-不行 我有事

translation.en: Oh, okay. Well, we'll see you tomorrow.
translation.zh: 好 我们明天见

translation.en: -[man] This is your table. -[Jenny] Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: [Jason] Ah, here she is.
translation.zh: 她来了

translation.en: Jenny.
translation.zh:
-詹妮
-你好

translation.en: Hi, Chloe.
translation.zh: 你好 克洛伊

translation.en: [waiter] Would you like some champagne, miss? Martini, up. Big.
translation.zh:
-想喝香槟吗 小姐？
-马提尼酒…大杯

translation.en: [waiter] Good.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: I missed you.
translation.zh: 我没见到你

translation.en: I mean, we missed you yesterday.
translation.zh: 我是说 我们昨天没见到你

translation.en: I must say, I'm...
translation.zh: 我必须说 我…

translation.en: I'm disturbed that you didn't come to our wedding.
translation.zh: 你没来参加婚礼 我很不安

translation.en: Jason, you promised.
translation.zh: 贾森 你答应过

translation.en: I know I promised, but it was a beautiful event, and I missed her.
translation.zh:
我知道我答应过
可这是件喜事 而且我想念她

translation.en: You should have been there.
translation.zh: 你应该来的

translation.en: The twins, they were running around like mad and throwing flowers.
translation.zh: 双胞胎四处疯跑 扔撒花瓣

translation.en: It was wonderful, especially Emma.
translation.zh: 真开心 特别是埃玛

translation.en: You know, the little one. She loves you.
translation.zh: 你知道的 那小家伙很喜欢你

translation.en: -It was beautiful. -She adores you. Yes.
translation.zh:
-很热闹
-她也想你去

translation.en: -She missed you too. -All right.
translation.zh:
-很热闹
-她也想你去 好

translation.en: This is from us for you.
translation.zh: 这是我们送给你的

translation.en: Are you not going to open it?
translation.zh: 你不打开看看吗？

translation.en: [whispering] I knew she wouldn't...
translation.zh: 我知道她不会…

translation.en: You can exchange them if you don't like them.
translation.zh: 如果不喜欢 你可以拿去换

translation.en: Jenny, I know this is hard. I just want you to be happy.
translation.zh:
詹妮 我知道这不容易
可我希望你幸福

translation.en: Happy.
translation.zh: 幸福

translation.en: Well... I would like to propose a toast to happiness, and to...
translation.zh: 我提议为幸福干杯…还要敬…

translation.en: Well, are we going to have an evening or not?
translation.zh: 我们还能开心地过一个夜晚吗？

translation.en: Jenny, I know that you hate me.
translation.zh: 詹妮 我知道你恨我

translation.en: I know that you have terrible things that you want to say to me.
translation.zh: 我知道你想对我说些可怕的话

translation.en: You have to get over it. Life goes on.
translation.zh: 你得想办法克服 继续生活

translation.en: Life goes on? Okay.
translation.zh: 继续生活？好啊

translation.en: What's so funny?
translation.zh: 这很好笑吗？

translation.en: Life...
translation.zh: 生活…

translation.en: [laughing] We'll see.
translation.zh: 我们再看吧

translation.en: What's so funny about "life goes on"?
translation.zh: 继续生活有什么好笑的？

translation.en: What? Life going on? I don't think it's funny that life goes on.
translation.zh: 继续生活？我不认为继续生活好笑

translation.en: Dad, you need to get back together with Mom.
translation.zh: 爸爸 你该回到妈妈身边

translation.en: She's all alone in the world, and she needs you right now.
translation.zh: 她很孤独 她现在正需要你 好吗？

translation.en: Jenny.
translation.zh: 詹妮

translation.en: I just got married. I know, I know, and I'm sorry.
translation.zh:
-我刚刚结婚
-我知道 对不起

translation.en: Chloe, this has nothing to do with you.
translation.zh: 克洛伊 这跟你没有关系

translation.en: [Jason] Well, it has to do something for me, for Christ's sake.
translation.zh: 看在上帝的份上 这跟我有关系

translation.en: This is insane. I have to apologize for my daughter.
translation.zh: 真是疯了 我得替我女儿道歉

translation.en: -[laughing] -It's not your fault.
translation.zh: 这不是你的错

translation.en: All right, I have to go.
translation.zh: 对不起 我得走了

translation.en: I know you think I'm a bad person. I'm really not.
translation.zh: 我知道你认为我很坏 可是我不坏

translation.en: And I don't hate you. I gotta... I just... I gotta go.
translation.zh: 我不恨你 我只是…必须走了

translation.en: [Beth] She's done exactly what we want her to do.
translation.zh: 她做了我们想要她做的事

translation.en: She signed the release, and so you have no problem.
translation.zh: 她签了同意书 你没问题了

translation.en: Because for her, it does... Excuse me.
translation.zh: 因为她 这对…我走开一下

translation.en: -Jenny. -Hey. How are you?
translation.zh:
-詹妮
-嘿 你好吗？

translation.en: -What are you doing here? -Excuse me. Sorry. Uh, yeah.
translation.zh:
-你在这儿干什么？
-是啊

translation.en: Did Stuart send you here without telling me?
translation.zh:
-是斯图尔特派你来的？
-不是

translation.en: No. Beth. I was gonna talk to you...
translation.zh: 不 贝思 我想跟你谈谈…

translation.en: If Stuart thinks he can push me out of the White House...
translation.zh:
如果斯图尔特认为他可以
把我挤出白宫…

translation.en: Miss Lerner. Hi, Beth.
translation.zh: 莱纳女士 嗨 贝思

translation.en: Right this way. I've got you right down here.
translation.zh: 这边请 我领你过去

translation.en: Excuse me, please.
translation.zh: 对不起 请

translation.en: Okay. He'll find you for the first question. Then you're on your own.
translation.zh:
好的 他会让你第一个提问
然后就靠你自己了

translation.en: Hey, how are you? Yeah.
translation.zh: 嘿 你怎么样？

translation.en: [press secretary] Ladies and gentlemen.
translation.zh: 女士们先生们

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, please.
translation.zh: 女士们先生们 请安静

translation.en: The president will begin by addressing the nation.
translation.zh: 总统将对全国发表讲话

translation.en: Please hold your questions until he's finished his remarks.
translation.zh: 在他结束讲话之前请不要提问题

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, the President of the United States.
translation.zh: 女士们先生们 美国总统

translation.en: Hello, everybody. [reporters] Hello, Mr. President.
translation.zh: 大家好

translation.en: [man] Ten seconds, Mr. President.
translation.zh: 十秒钟 总统先生

translation.en: Five, four.
translation.zh: 五、四…

translation.en: Good evening.
translation.zh: 晚上好

translation.en: A few minutes ago, the United States' ambassadors to every country in the world
translation.zh: 几分钟前 美国驻各国的大使

translation.en: told the leaders of those nations what I am about to tell you.
translation.zh:
告诉了其所驻国的领导人
我即将讲述的内容

translation.en: It's a bit complicated, so it will take some time.
translation.zh: 这有点复杂 要花些时间

translation.en: So I hope you will bear with me, hear what I have to say.
translation.zh: 我希望你们能耐心听我把话说完

translation.en: A little over a year ago,
translation.zh: 一年多前

translation.en: two American astronomers, Marcus Wolf and Leo Beiderman,
translation.zh:
两位美国天文学家
马克斯沃尔夫和利奥比德曼

translation.en: working on a mountain top in Arizona,
translation.zh: 在亚利桑那山顶上…

translation.en: -Shh. Nobody say anything. -saw something in the night sky
translation.zh: 大家别说话

translation.en: that caused them great concern.
translation.zh: …这让他们很担心

translation.en: A comet.
translation.zh: 一颗彗星

translation.en: But the comet was, well...
translation.zh: 那颗彗星 嗯…

translation.en: There was a remote possibility that the comet was on a path
translation.zh: 有种很小的可能性 彗星的轨道

translation.en: that could bring it into direct contact with the Earth.
translation.zh: 可能会带它撞向地球

translation.en: Now, we get hit all the time by rocks and meteors,
translation.zh: 我们常常会受到岩石和流星的撞击

translation.en: some of them the size of cars, some no bigger than your hand.
translation.zh:
有些像汽车那么大
有些像手掌那么大

translation.en: But the comet we discovered is the size of New York City.
translation.zh: 但我们发现这颗彗星有纽约城那么大

translation.en: From the north side of Central Park to the Battery.
translation.zh: 从中央公园到巴特瑞

translation.en: About seven miles long.
translation.zh: 大约有11公里长

translation.en: Put another way, this comet is larger than Mount Everest.
translation.zh:
换一种说法
这颗彗星比珠穆朗玛峰还大

translation.en: It weighs 500 billion tons.
translation.zh: 它有五千亿吨重

translation.en: Now, chances are...
translation.zh:
现在 情况有可能是
它不会撞上地球…

translation.en: Astrophysicists, geologists and climatologists.
translation.zh:
…天体物理学家
地质学家和气候学家

translation.en: Where the hell is science?
translation.zh: 科学人员在哪？

translation.en: Paris, London, Tokyo, Tel Aviv. I want it everywhere.
translation.zh:
巴黎、伦敦、东京和特拉维夫
联系所有地区

translation.en: Get the Hale-Bopp stand-ups.
translation.zh: 海耳望远镜准备好了吗？

translation.en: And graphics! I need graphics!
translation.zh: 图表！我需要图表！

translation.en: [President Beck] Comets begin far out in space.
translation.zh: 彗星在宇宙远处形成

translation.en: They're what's left over from the creation of the solar system
translation.zh: 它们是太阳系生成时的残留物

translation.en: after the planets were formed billions of years ago.
translation.zh:
那是在几十亿年前
星球形成之后的事

translation.en: Now, these chunks of space debris are in an elongated orbit around our sun.
translation.zh:
这些大块宇宙残骸
沿着椭圆长形轨道围着太阳转

translation.en: But every now and then one of them gets bumped,
translation.zh: 不时有些彗星碰撞

translation.en: sort of like a billiard ball on a pool table, and is knocked into a different orbit.
translation.zh:
就像台球桌上的球一样
被撞入另一个轨道

translation.en: Now, if this comet continues on its path around the sun
translation.zh:
如果这颗彗星
继续沿着轨道围着太阳转

translation.en: and keeps its present course,
translation.zh: 保持现有的飞行路线

translation.en: sometime on August 16th, roughly a year from now,
translation.zh: 大约一年之后 在8月16日左右

translation.en: there's a chance that we might have impact.
translation.zh: 我们可能会受到撞击

translation.en: So for the past eight months, the United States and Russia
translation.zh: 过去六个月来 美国和俄罗斯

translation.en: have been building the largest spaceship ever constructed.
translation.zh: 一直在建最大的宇宙飞船

translation.en: It's being built in orbit around the Earth. And we call it the Messiah.
translation.zh:
它将围着地球飞行
我们将其命名为救世主号

translation.en: And right now, a team of American astronauts and one Russian are at Cape Canaveral in Florida.
translation.zh:
一队美国和一名俄罗斯宇航员
正在佛罗里达的卡纳维拉尔角

translation.en: In two months, they will leave on the shuttle Atlantis to board the Messiah.
translation.zh:
两个月后 他们将乘坐
亚特兰蒂斯飞船前往救世主号

translation.en: This is the crew that will stop the comet.
translation.zh: 这是我们阻止彗星撞击的宇航团队

translation.en: I'd like the world to meet some extraordinary people.
translation.zh: 我希望大家与这些杰出人物见面

translation.en: First is Mission Commander Oren Monash.
translation.zh: 首先是队长奥伦蒙纳斯

translation.en: Commander, would you introduce us to your team?
translation.zh: 请你介绍一下你的队员 好吗？

translation.en: I'd be honored, sir.
translation.zh: 非常荣幸 总统先生

translation.en: Pilot Andrea Baker.
translation.zh: 驾驶员安德莉亚贝克

translation.en: Medical officer Gus Partenza.
translation.zh: 医务员格斯帕顿兹

translation.en: From Russia, nuclear specialist Colonel Mikhail Tulchinsky.
translation.zh: 俄罗斯的核专家 米克海尔上校

translation.en: Navigator Mark Simon, and rendezvous pilot Spurgeon Tanner.
translation.zh:
领航员马克西蒙
对接驾驶员斯波金谭纳

translation.en: [all] Hello, Mr. President.
translation.zh:
-你好 总统先生
-你好 总统先生

translation.en: Captain Tanner, you flew six shuttle missions.
translation.zh: 谭纳队长 你曾驾驶过六次航天飞机

translation.en: You were the last man to walk on the moon, weren't you, sir?
translation.zh: 你是最后一位在月球上行走的人

translation.en: Yes, sir, but... Oren here will be doing most of the flying on this one.
translation.zh:
是的 先生
这次主要由奥伦驾驶飞船

translation.en: I'll just be taking us down to the comet's surface.
translation.zh: 我只是把大家带到彗星表面

translation.en: Well, it's good to know we're going to have your kind of experience up there, Captain.
translation.zh:
知道有你们这样有经验的人在
我们就放心了

translation.en: [Tanner] Thank you, sir.
translation.zh:
-谢谢你 总统先生
-愿上帝保佑你们

translation.en: Godspeed to you all. We're counting on you.
translation.zh:
-谢谢你 总统先生
-愿上帝保佑你们 -我们就靠你们了
-谢谢 先生

translation.en: Thank you, sir.
translation.zh:
-我们就靠你们了
-谢谢 先生

translation.en: Got Beijing, Rome, Sao Paulo, Cairo, Berlin!
translation.zh:
联系北京、罗马
圣保罗、开罗、柏林

translation.en: Does anyone know how big the one was that killed all the dinosaurs?
translation.zh: 有谁知道杀死恐龙的那颗彗星多大？

translation.en: Something majestic, mysterious, with a fanfare for the intro and a theme to the longer promos.
translation.zh:
开篇要够吸引 使用壮观、神秘
并且可以持续宣传的主题

translation.en: It's hitting the goddamn Earth? That's what he's saying. Bring that up again.
translation.zh:
-你想让它撞击地球吗？
-他是这么说的

translation.en: He'll scare the shit out of everybody.
translation.zh: 这会吓坏他们的

translation.en: Our society will continue as normal.
translation.zh: 我们的社会将继续如常

translation.en: Work will go on. You will pay your bills.
translation.zh: 人们照常工作 你还是得交税

translation.en: There will be no hoarding.
translation.zh: 不会再有人囤积物资

translation.en: There will be no sudden profiteering.
translation.zh: 不会再有暴发户

translation.en: I'm freezing all wages, all prices.
translation.zh: 我要冻结所有的工资和价格

translation.en: What a bottle of water cost you yesterday,
translation.zh: 昨天一瓶水的价格

translation.en: it will cost you tomorrow.
translation.zh: 也将是明天的价格

translation.en: Now we'll take a few questions.
translation.zh:
-现在我接受几个提问
-总统先生！

translation.en: -Miss Lerner. -[clears throat]
translation.zh: 莱纳女士

translation.en: [clears throat] Uh, Jenny Lerner, MSNBC. Jenny Lerner?
translation.zh:
-詹妮莱纳 MSNBC记者
-詹妮莱纳？

translation.en: Son of a bitch.
translation.zh: 混蛋！

translation.en: Um, Mr. President, why wasn't this announcement made sooner?
translation.zh:
总统先生
为何没有尽早公布此消息？

translation.en: Well, until we knew we could build the rocket
translation.zh: 嗯 在我们知道能制造出火箭

translation.en: and the comet could be intercepted,
translation.zh: 来拦截彗星之前

translation.en: we saw no reason to alarm the planet.
translation.zh: 我们认为没有理由引起恐慌

translation.en: Do you have another question, Miss Lerner? Yeah. Um...
translation.zh:
-还有问题吗 莱纳女士？
-有

translation.en: Is...is there a connection between the comet
translation.zh: 彗星跟召回海外美军 有没有联系？

translation.en: and the recall of American troops from abroad?
translation.zh: 有没有联系？

translation.en: [President Beck] Our fighting men and women are coming home
translation.zh:
我们的男女军人回来
是因为我们觉得应谨慎行事

translation.en: because we felt it prudent, in light of domestic security concerns, to have them available.
translation.zh: 为了国防安全 让他们随时待命

translation.en: Although I certainly hope we don't need to use them.
translation.zh: 我也希望我们不会用到他们

translation.en: -Next question. -[reporters clamoring]
translation.zh: 下一个问题

translation.en: Actually, Mr. President, if... Just one final question, sir. Um...
translation.zh:
实际上 总统先生 如…
最后一个问题 先生

translation.en: MSNBC has learned that Secretary Rittenhouse
translation.zh: MSNBC得知 里顿豪斯部长

translation.en: did not leave for the reasons announced by your administration.
translation.zh: 离职的原因与你们的说法有异

translation.en: In fact, isn't it true, sir,
translation.zh:
实际上 先生
是不是你的政府的每个人

translation.en: that not everyone in your administration is convinced that the Messiah will save us?
translation.zh: 都相信救世主号能救我们？

translation.en: Secretary Rittenhouse served his country with full devotion.
translation.zh: 里顿豪斯部长为国衷心效劳

translation.en: He resigned for personal reasons.
translation.zh: 他的辞职是由于私人原因

translation.en: Now, I can promise you this, Miss Lerner, all of you,
translation.zh:
我可以向你保证
莱纳女士 向所有的人保证

translation.en: everyone in this room and everyone listening to my voice,
translation.zh: 所有在场的人 所有听我讲话的人

translation.en: that at some point over the next ten months,
translation.zh: 在今后十个月的某个时间

translation.en: all of us will entertain our worst fears and concerns.
translation.zh: 我们大家都会感到无比恐惧和担忧

translation.en: But I can also promise you this.
translation.zh: 可是我也可以向你们保证

translation.en: Life will go on.
translation.zh: 生活将如常继续

translation.en: We will prevail.
translation.zh: 我们会化解危机

translation.en: -Mr. President! Please! -[reporters shouting]
translation.zh:
-总统先生！我！
-莎莉

translation.en: Sir, what is the comet's name?
translation.zh: 先生 这颗彗星叫什么名字？

translation.en: The two scientists who found the comet were killed in a car crash
translation.zh: 两位发现它的科学家皆因车祸死亡

translation.en: while racing from their observatory to alert the world.
translation.zh:
他们在从天文台
来警告我们的路上发生车祸

translation.en: So we named it for them. Wolf-Beiderman.
translation.zh: 所以我们称它为沃尔夫比德曼

translation.en: [chuckles] Leo Beiderman, they said it again.
translation.zh: 利奥比德曼 他们又说了一遍

translation.en: -Shh! -Leo, is he talking about you? -He is, isn't he? -I'm trying to listen.
translation.zh:
-利奥 他是在说你 是不是？
-我在听着呢

translation.en: -[phone rings] -Why were the Russians brought...
translation.zh: …俄罗斯参与了该任务

translation.en: -[doorbell rings] -Can you get that, please?
translation.zh:
…俄罗斯参与了该任务 -你能去开门吗？
-珍妮 去开门

translation.en: Janie, get the door.
translation.zh:
-你能去开门吗？
-珍妮 去开门

translation.en: [President Beck] Well, we have the technology to build the ship.
translation.zh: 我们有制造飞船的技术

translation.en: They have the technology to make it go.
translation.zh: 他们也有驾驶它的技术

translation.en: There's someone at the door for you, Leo.
translation.zh: 有人来找你 利奥

translation.en: [newscaster] You've been watching live coverage of President Tom Beck...
translation.zh:
你正在收看的是
汤姆贝克总统的现场直播…

translation.en: I can't believe this. This is so weird.
translation.zh: 我不敢相信 真是荒诞

translation.en: Dr. Wolf from astronomy club? Yeah, I guess so.
translation.zh:
-天文俱乐部的沃尔夫博士
-我想是的

translation.en: I think it's really neat. Nobody on our block discovered the world was gonna end before.
translation.zh:
我觉得很厉害 我们这儿以前没人
发现末日即将来临

translation.en: [Don] He's still very much alive. He's still alive, everyone.
translation.zh: 他还活着 诸位

translation.en: He's right here, and he's still alive. [chuckles] Okay?
translation.zh: 他就在这儿 他还活着

translation.en: [boy] Hey, Leo, cool!
translation.zh: 嘿 利奥 酷！

translation.en: [Leo] As far as we know, what happened was that Dr. Wolf saw the comet in my photograph,
translation.zh:
据我们所知
沃尔夫看到我照片里的彗星

translation.en: so he shared the discovery with me.
translation.zh: 所以他和我分享了这个发现

translation.en: And then he was killed in that crash and everything got mixed up in Washington,
translation.zh: 后来他出车祸 华盛顿那里就搞混了

translation.en: so the president thought I was dead too.
translation.zh: 总统以为我也死了

translation.en: Jasmine.
translation.zh: 利奥 贾斯明

translation.en: How does it feel having your name on it?
translation.zh: 对于你的名字在上面 你感觉如何？

translation.en: I don't want anyone to think that I'm trying to take something away from Dr. Wolf,
translation.zh:
我不想人们以为
我窃取了沃尔夫的成果

translation.en: because I'm not. But it's kind of cool.
translation.zh: 我没有那么做 可是感觉很酷

translation.en: Jason.
translation.zh: 杰森

translation.en: You know, you're gonna have sex a lot more now than anyone else in our class.
translation.zh:
你知道吗？
你将是我们班里性生活最多的人

translation.en: -[crowd applauding] -Don't listen. Don't.
translation.zh: 不要听 不要

translation.en: Really?
translation.zh: 真的吗？

translation.en: Thank you for your sexual insight, Mr. Thurman. You can sit down now.
translation.zh:
谢谢你的性见解
瑟曼先生 你可以坐下了

translation.en: Famous people always get sex, Mr. Perry.
translation.zh: 名人总有女孩原意献身 佩里先生

translation.en: That's the main reason it's good to be famous.
translation.zh: 这也是出名是好事的主要原因

translation.en: Fruit, a reactor. Bottle, a rocket, okay?
translation.zh: 水果是反应堆 瓶子是火箭 好吗？

translation.en: -A nuclear reactor in space? -Yes.
translation.zh:
-宇宙核反应堆？
-是的

translation.en: Isn't that dangerous?
translation.zh:
-这不危险吗？
-不

translation.en: No, no, no. This is all Russian design. Russian science.
translation.zh: 这都是俄罗斯设计的 俄罗斯技术

translation.en: Uh, the same people who designed Chernobyl.
translation.zh: 就是设计切尔诺贝利的那些人

translation.en: [woman] Chernobyl? -Chernobyl almost worked. -[laughing]
translation.zh:
-切尔诺贝利？
-切尔诺贝利差点成功了

translation.en: So, what happens after you plant the bomb?
translation.zh: 你放置炸弹后会怎么样？

translation.en: Well, we have seven hours. We're gonna put the bombs inside the comet.
translation.zh:
我们有七个小时
我们把炸弹放入彗星

translation.en: I'm gonna follow these two. I don't trust that combination.
translation.zh: 我去跟着他们俩 我怕他们会捣蛋

translation.en: After seven hours, the 14-hour rotational cycle of the comet spins.
translation.zh:
七小时之后 十四小时
运转周期的彗星开始运转

translation.en: We're gonna get married. God knows I want to marry you.
translation.zh: 我们得结婚 上帝知道我要和你结婚 我回来以后

translation.en: But the day I get back,
translation.zh: 上帝知道我要和你结婚 我回来以后

translation.en: the last thing I'm gonna do is step inside a church. I don't do churches well.
translation.zh:
最不想做的事就是进教堂
我不去教堂

translation.en: 'Cause there's only seven hours of darkness. Then the sun starts hitting the surface of the planet and it causes...
translation.zh:
七个小时的黑暗
然后太阳撞击行星表面

translation.en: -[Oren] These are your orders. -[woman chuckles]
translation.zh: 这是你的命令

translation.en: Upon first entering Earth's atmosphere,
translation.zh: 一旦进入大气层

translation.en: proceed immediately up the exterior of the mother ship.
translation.zh: 立即加速到母舰外部

translation.en: When the sun hits the surface,
translation.zh: 当太阳照射表面时

translation.en: there's gonna be explosive outgassings that are very dangerous...
translation.zh: 会排放大量危险气体…

translation.en: -Gus, he's seven. -Brittany.
translation.zh:
-格斯 他才七岁
-布列塔尼

translation.en: You boys were, what, four and six when I went to the moon?
translation.zh:
你们两个小伙子
我登月时你们才四岁、六岁？

translation.en: Now, you saw me go into space seven times, didn't ya?
translation.zh: 你们见过我七次进入太空 是不是？

translation.en: I came back every time, didn't I? Yeah.
translation.zh:
-每次我都回来了 是不是？
-是的

translation.en: Your mother and I used to play a game when she was still alive.
translation.zh: 你妈妈生前跟我玩过一个游戏

translation.en: Now, the game was, if there was a chance I might not be coming back,
translation.zh: 游戏是如果我回不来

translation.en: she wouldn't say it, and I wouldn't say it.
translation.zh: 她不会说的 我也不会说的

translation.en: Okay?
translation.zh: 好吗？

translation.en: -Yes, sir. -Yes, sir.
translation.zh:
-是的
-是的 先生

translation.en: -[Mitch] Hey, Fish. How about a beer? -[Tanner] Hey, Mitch.
translation.zh:
嘿 菲斯 -嘿 米奇
-来点啤酒怎么样？

translation.en: You remember my boys, don't you?
translation.zh:
你记得我的儿子 是吧？
斯蒂夫和德怀特

translation.en: -Steve and Dwight. -Of course I do.
translation.zh:
你记得我的儿子 是吧？
斯蒂夫和德怀特 当然记得 先生 欢迎来到休斯敦

translation.en: Gentlemen, welcome to Houston.
translation.zh: 当然记得 先生 欢迎来到休斯敦

translation.en: Let me steal your old man for a second.
translation.zh: 我借走一下你们老爸

translation.en: -[girl] Can I take your picture, please? -Okay.
translation.zh:
-能给你们照张相吗？
-好

translation.en: -Thank you. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: So, what do you think of the crew?
translation.zh: 你觉得队员们怎么样？

translation.en: Heroes all.
translation.zh: 每个都是英雄

translation.en: That's the finest group I ever had the privilege of working with. Yeah, yeah.
translation.zh: 我接触过的最好的队员

translation.en: Off the record, huh?
translation.zh: 是的 私底下你觉得怎样？

translation.en: Well, they've been trained in ways I'll never understand.
translation.zh: 他们训练的方式 我永远不能理解

translation.en: They're smarter and in better shape than we ever were in the old days. They're sober, serious.
translation.zh:
他们比我们那时的状态更棒
不酗酒 很认真

translation.en: I guess I'd be a little happier about this whole thing
translation.zh: 我想如果我认为他们都跟我一样害怕

translation.en: if I thought that any of them were as scared as I am.
translation.zh: 我可能会高兴一点

translation.en: Well, they're not scared of dyin'. They're just scared of looking bad on TV.
translation.zh: 他们不怕死 只怕在镜头里不好看

translation.en: Now, look, I wish I'd been to the moon.
translation.zh: 瞧 我希望我到过月球

translation.en: I got respect for everybody who's gone to the moon. But this mission ain't going to the moon.
translation.zh:
我崇拜任何到过月球的人
但我们不去月球

translation.en: That's right. Frank Gifford, he was a great football player in his time,
translation.zh:
是的 弗兰克吉福德
是那时著名的足球队员

translation.en: but if he played now, he'd get his ass busted.
translation.zh:
可是如果他现在踢
他的屁股肯定保不住了

translation.en: [Mark] That's right.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: All I'm saying is, the moon did not have a rotational cycle of 14 hours.
translation.zh:
我想说的是
月亮没有14小时的运转周期

translation.en: I mean, this is... We only have seven hours of dark when the sun's not up to land on this thing.
translation.zh:
我们只有七个小时的黑夜
太阳照不到这个东西

translation.en: It was light when he landed. This is gonna be dark. We're not gonna be able to see.
translation.zh:
他着陆时是白天
可这次是黑夜 我们看不到

translation.en: You can't see now, Gus. [Mikhail] Don't worry.
translation.zh:
-你现在也看不到 格斯
-别担心

translation.en: -We what? -We can do it.
translation.zh:
-我们什么？
-我们会成功的

translation.en: No, no, no. Sit down.
translation.zh: 不 坐下

translation.en: I woke up this morning, and I realized none of you want me here.
translation.zh: 我今早醒来 意识到你们都不想要我

translation.en: You don't even really know who I am, which is okay.
translation.zh: 你们不知道我是谁 这没什么

translation.en: I walked on the moon. But I didn't belong to you. I belonged to your daddies.
translation.zh: 我在月球上走过 我属于你爸爸那辈

translation.en: Now, if I ask you to ask your daddies what I meant to them,
translation.zh:
现在 如果我让你问你爸爸
我对他们意味着什么

translation.en: to explain to you what I'm doing here, that's only gonna make things worse.
translation.zh:
让他们告诉你们 我来这儿干什么
这只会让事情变得更糟糕

translation.en: So... What do we do?
translation.zh: 那…我们能做什么呢？

translation.en: You haven't trained for this mission.
translation.zh: 你没有为这次任务接受过训练

translation.en: We respect you. I appreciate that.
translation.zh:
-我们尊敬你
-我很感谢你们

translation.en: But you're here... You're here because the powers that be
translation.zh: 你在这儿是因为当权者认为这次航行

translation.en: think we need a familiar face on this trip.
translation.zh: 我们需要一个熟悉的面孔

translation.en: You're here for public relations.
translation.zh: 你来是为了公关

translation.en: No, no. I'm here because the powers that be know
translation.zh: 我来是因为当局知道

translation.en: that I'm the only person on this mission who's ever landed on the moon.
translation.zh: 我是使团中唯一到过月球的人

translation.en: And I have 500 landings on aircraft carriers.
translation.zh: 我有500次的飞船着陆经历

translation.en: We've trained on... On flight simulators. Right?
translation.zh:
-我们受过训练…
-在飞行模拟器上？

translation.en: I mean, this is not a video game, son. It really isn't.
translation.zh:
我是说 这不是录像游戏
这真的不是

translation.en: [chuckling] It really isn't. No.
translation.zh: 这真的不是 真的

translation.en: [male announcer] We are go for auto-sequence start.
translation.zh: 我们将采用自动程序启动

translation.en: Atlantis' four onboard computers now have primary control
translation.zh:
亚特兰蒂斯的四台电脑
将控制飞船的关键功能

translation.en: of all the vehicle's critical functions.
translation.zh:
亚特兰蒂斯的四台电脑
将控制飞船的关键功能 （救世主号 任务第一天）

translation.en: Okay, all flight controllers, we're at T-minus 30 seconds and counting.
translation.zh: 好 航天调度员 还有30秒起飞

translation.en: Let's take a close look.
translation.zh: 仔细检查各项指标

translation.en: APUs look good, LOX and LH2 are pressurized.
translation.zh:
辅助动力装置没问题
测程仪和液氢已增压

translation.en: [man 1 on radio] Ten, nine, eight...
translation.zh: 十、九、八…

translation.en: [Jerry] Flight, we're go for auto-sequence. [man 2] Roger, Jerry.
translation.zh:
-航天员 我们采用自动程序
-明白

translation.en: Good luck and Godspeed, Atlantis. [Oren on radio] Thanks, Mitch.
translation.zh:
-祝你们好运、成功
-谢谢 米奇

translation.en: [man 1] ...three, two, one.
translation.zh: 三、二、一

translation.en: [newscaster] Propelled by 500,000 pounds of liquid fuel,
translation.zh: 由50万磅重的液体燃料驱动

translation.en: the shuttle crew heads toward their initial destination.
translation.zh: 航天飞机组员朝其初步目标挺进

translation.en: When the crew enters the Messiah, they will find a payload of eight nuclear devices
translation.zh:
当组员进入救世主号时
他们将可以拿到八个核装置

translation.en: that will eventually be used to blow up the comet.
translation.zh: 用以炸掉这颗彗星

translation.en: The Messiah itself will be powered by an experimental nuclear propulsion system
translation.zh: 救世主号将由核系统驱动

translation.en: that was originally created for a very different purpose.
translation.zh: 该系统是为别的用途创建的

translation.en: That program was called Orion.
translation.zh: 一个名为猎户的计划

translation.en: Now, with the help of Russian engineers,
translation.zh: 现在有了俄罗斯工程师的帮助

translation.en: a technology designed to propel weapons of mass destruction
translation.zh:
一个设计用来驱动
大杀伤性武器的技术

translation.en: will power the ship that will intercept the greatest threat our planet has ever faced.
translation.zh:
将驱动飞船去拦截
我们星球面临的最大的威胁

translation.en: [Mikhail] Orion burn...
translation.zh: 猎户即将点燃推进器…

translation.en: in ten, nine,
translation.zh: 十、九

translation.en: eight, seven,
translation.zh: 八、七

translation.en: six, five,
translation.zh: 六、五

translation.en: four, three,
translation.zh: 四、三

translation.en: two, one, zero.
translation.zh: 二、一、零

translation.en: Okay, Beth, White House reactions.
translation.zh: 好的 贝思负责报道白宫的反应

translation.en: Marianne, the whole world watching.
translation.zh: （五个月后）

translation.en: -We have enough satellite space? -Seventy-eight uplinks.
translation.zh:
-玛丽安 卫星空间够吗？
-78条上行线路

translation.en: [Stuart] Tim, mission control in Houston. Ira, the science guys lined up?
translation.zh:
提姆 休斯敦任务控制中心
艾拉 科学家们准备好了吗？

translation.en: If they got a Ph.D., we own them.
translation.zh: 如果他们是博士 我们要他们

translation.en: All right, this is the most important story of our lives. Let's not muck it up.
translation.zh:
这是我们一生中
最重要的报道 别搞砸了

translation.en: Stuart, what about me?
translation.zh: 斯图尔特 那我呢？

translation.en: -You're on the anchor desk. -Whoa! And you could have been there a lot sooner.
translation.zh: 你上主播台 你可以马上就去

translation.en: -What are you talking about? -You know what I'm talking about.
translation.zh:
-你在说什么？
-你知道的

translation.en: Don't ever hold back a story from me again.
translation.zh: 别再对我隐瞒什么了

translation.en: [Mitch on radio] Messiah, Houston. Transfer trajectory is go.
translation.zh:
救世主号 休斯敦
转变轨道即将开始

translation.en: We'll cancel MCC-1. You're go to configure for coast.
translation.zh:
我们取消了MCC1
你们要配置登岸

translation.en: Roger, Houston, we're looking good here.
translation.zh: 明白 休斯敦 我们没问题

translation.en: Jesus, that's big.
translation.zh: 天啊 真大

translation.en: Holy shit.
translation.zh: 我的天啊

translation.en: Sweet mother of God.
translation.zh: 我的上帝之母啊

translation.en: [man on radio] All circuit breakers are open. Master arm is off.
translation.zh: 所有线路开关已打开 主臂脱离

translation.en: [Oren on radio] Roger. And the detonator system is safe.
translation.zh: 明白 起爆系统安全 （密码已接受）

translation.en: [Mitch] Messiah, Houston. Stand by for an uplink of the final mole coordinates.
translation.zh:
救世主号 休斯顿
准备鼹鼠的最后协调连接

translation.en: Confirm when complete. [Oren] Wilco, Houston.
translation.zh:
-完成后汇报
-遵命 休斯敦

translation.en: Hey, how's it comin'?
translation.zh: 嘿 怎么样了？

translation.en: [Andrea on radio] Loading first nuke now.
translation.zh: 现在安装第一个核弹

translation.en: [Andrea] One thousand feet to stand-off.
translation.zh: 离巡航还有305米

translation.en: R-dot 3, 5x, 2y.
translation.zh:
R.3 5X 2Y （计划拦截
自动弹道）

translation.en: Five hundred feet. R-dot point 3, 3x, 1.5y.
Go for auto trajectory.
translation.zh: 选用自动弹道

translation.en: We're there.
translation.zh:
-好了
-剩余误差为零自动弹道

translation.en: [Oren] Residuals are nulled.
translation.zh: （自动弹道）

translation.en: [Andrea] Disengage Orion.
translation.zh: 脱离猎户

translation.en: Orion disengaged. You're on bi-prop.
translation.zh: 猎户已脱离 你在二级火箭上

translation.en: [announcer] This is a special presentation of MSNBC News
translation.zh:
这是来自詹妮莱纳的
MSNBC特别报道

translation.en: with Jenny Lerner.
translation.zh: （拯救地球 詹妮莱纳主持）

translation.en: Good evening.
translation.zh: 晚上好

translation.en: Sometime in the next hour, the Messiah mission will enter its most critical phase:
translation.zh:
一个小时后
救世主号将进入关键时刻

translation.en: the interception of Wolf-Beiderman and the setting of the nuclear devices
translation.zh:
拦截沃尔夫比德曼彗星
并安放核装置

translation.en: that will deflect it off its collision course with Earth.
translation.zh: 从而使彗星偏转 避免与地球相撞

translation.en: But first, Captain Spurgeon Tanner
translation.zh: （拯救地球 詹妮莱纳主持） 但首先 斯波金谭纳队长将引导飞船

translation.en: will have to guide the spacecraft
translation.zh: 但首先 斯波金谭纳队长将引导飞船

translation.en: through the blizzard of rocks, sand, and ice that make up the comet's tail, or coma.
translation.zh: 通过满是沙石、冰块的彗星尾巴

translation.en: The crew will have to complete its work before the sun rises.
translation.zh: 队员必须在日出前完成其工作

translation.en: Sublimator looks good, Mick. [Tanner over radio] Disengaging auto now.
translation.zh:
-净化器看起来没问题 麦克
-正在自动脱离

translation.en: I'm eyeballs out from here on in.
translation.zh: 我从现在起将减速

translation.en: How come that doesn't make me feel any better?
translation.zh: 为什么我并没感觉好一些？

translation.en: [Tanner] I heard that.
translation.zh: 我听到了

translation.en: Lights on.
translation.zh: 开灯

translation.en: Cameras on.
translation.zh: 开摄像机

translation.en: [Tanner] The Mississippi River in Mark Twain's time,
translation.zh: 在马克吐温时的密西西比河上

translation.en: there were riverboat pilots who only knew a few miles of the river.
translation.zh: 有些只熟悉几千米河道的船舶领航员

translation.en: I mean, conditions changed so much, you couldn't know the whole trip.
translation.zh:
环境变化很快
你不知道整段航程的风险

translation.en: Floods, sandbars, fallen logs.
translation.zh: 洪水 河口沙坝 落木

translation.en: It was all a riverboat pilot could do, was to know his little piece of the puzzle.
translation.zh: 这就是领航员要解决的难题

translation.en: So for the next few hours, this is my ship.
translation.zh:
在接下来的几个小时里
我就是领航员

translation.en: We start our approach.
translation.zh: 我们出发吧

translation.en: [Jenny] ...are images from cameras mounted inside the cargo bay of the Messiah.
translation.zh:
…是来自救世主号
货舱内摄像机的图像

translation.en: Now, these images are delayed by approximately 20 seconds,
translation.zh: 由于距离关系

translation.en: due to the distance they must travel.
translation.zh: 这些图像会慢大概20秒

translation.en: Okay, you can see that the image is breaking up a bit.
translation.zh: 你们可以看到图像有点不稳定

translation.en: Uh, Houston is prepared for this.
translation.zh: 休斯敦对此已有所准备

translation.en: They've informed us that due to the uncertain makeup of the comet's coma,
translation.zh:
他们通知我们
由于慧发的成份不确定

translation.en: they're unsure whether or not transmission will be possible.
translation.zh: 他们不知道能否持续传送图像

translation.en: Okay, now... Now it appears we're losing reception here.
translation.zh: 现在我们好像失去了讯号

translation.en: Okay, we've...We've lost picture now.
translation.zh: 我们无法看到图像

translation.en: But we will stay on the air.
translation.zh: 但我们将继续实时报道

translation.en: We'll stay with you through all of this.
translation.zh: 我们将一直跟踪此事件

translation.en: [Andrea over intercom] Prop 96 percent.
translation.zh: 推动力 96%

translation.en: DAP is in descent. [Tanner over intercom] Roger, descent.
translation.zh:
-导弹在下降
-明白 下降

translation.en: Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 啊 我的天啊

translation.en: [Andrea] Look at these. They're the size of houses.
translation.zh:
啊 我的天啊 -你瞧这些 有房子那么大
-是的 我看到了

translation.en: Yeah, I know. I see.
translation.zh:
-你瞧这些 有房子那么大
-是的 我看到了

translation.en: Jesus Christ.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: -[Andrea] Prop, 88 percent. -[beeping]
translation.zh: 推动力 88%

translation.en: [Andrea] Cabin press, 5.7.
translation.zh: 机舱压力 5.7

translation.en: Negative guidance errors.
translation.zh: 无导向错误

translation.en: -[alarm blaring] -[Tanner] Use your primary thrusters. [Andrea] Primary thrusters.
translation.zh:
-使用初级推进器
-初级推进器

translation.en: -[Tanner] What's the descent rate? -Three feet per second. Two.
translation.zh:
-下降的速度是多少？
-每秒一米 六十厘米

translation.en: Fire tether pitons. Pitons fired.
translation.zh:
-发射拴链钢锥
-刚锥已发射

translation.en: She's leveling out.
translation.zh: 她在调整倾斜度

translation.en: [Andrea] Depressurizing bay.
translation.zh: 机舱降压中

translation.en: [Tanner] Opening payload doors.
translation.zh: 正在打开弹药库门

translation.en: Don't let that little bit of gravity down there go to your heads.
translation.zh: 别让那里小小的重力影响你的头脑

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Start the clock.
translation.zh: 启动时钟

translation.en: [Jenny] If all is going according to schedule,
translation.zh: 如果一切按计划进行

translation.en: the astronauts should now be placing the moles on the comet surface.
translation.zh:
宇航员应该正把鼹鼠
放置在彗星表面

translation.en: The moles are, well, they're what they sound like.
translation.zh: 鼹鼠就是 嗯 就像鼹鼠

translation.en: They are drilling machines that burrow to a depth of 100 meters,
translation.zh: 它们是能钻一百米深的钻洞机器

translation.en: where they wait to be detonated.
translation.zh: 它们会在地底等待被引爆

translation.en: Each one carries a 5,000-kiloton warhead.
translation.zh: 每个都带有一个五百万吨的弹头

translation.en: How's our time? It's getting tight. 1:36:30.
translation.zh:
-我们还剩多少时间？
-得赶紧了 1小时36分30秒

translation.en: It's taking too long. [breathes deeply] Yep.
translation.zh:
-耗时太长了
-是啊

translation.en: What happens if they do not get off the comet's surface in time?
translation.zh:
若它们不能按时
到达彗星表面怎么办？

translation.en: The sun striking the comet will cause the temperature to rise 350 degrees in just a few minutes
translation.zh:
太阳照到彗星上
会使温度在数秒内上升350度

translation.en: and activate the high-speed gas jets.
translation.zh: 那将引起高速气体喷发

translation.en: Well, if that happens, it will be like trying to work in a minefield.
translation.zh:
如果发生这种情况
那就像是在雷区里工作

translation.en: [Tanner on radio] Mark, what's your mole 4 readout? [Mark] Mole 4 running true at 75 feet.
translation.zh:
-马克 你的鼹鼠四进度如何？
-鼹鼠四在23米处运行

translation.en: Son of a bitch.
translation.zh:
-混蛋
-什么？

translation.en: -[Mark] What? -It's stuck.
translation.zh:
-混蛋
-什么？ -卡住了
-试着退出来

translation.en: Try backing it up.
translation.zh:
-卡住了
-试着退出来

translation.en: -[Andrea] What's your depth? -Seventy-five feet.
translation.zh:
-你的深度是多少？
-23米

translation.en: Is that enough? No. That'll just break pieces off the surface.
translation.zh:
-够不够？
-不够 只会炸掉几块表面的石块

translation.en: That's not deep enough. Yeah, Fish, I know that's not deep enough.
translation.zh:
-不够深
-是的 菲斯 我知道

translation.en: -I'm going in. -[Mark] Oren, no.
translation.zh:
-我要进去了
-奥伦 不要

translation.en: [Oren] No, I'm gonna see if I can free it up.
translation.zh: 不 我要看看是否能松脱

translation.en: Stand by, tether attached. All right, I gotcha.
translation.zh:
-准备好 拴链附上了
-好的 我知道了

translation.en: [Andrea] Oren, suit pressure, 3.5.
translation.zh: 奥伦 航天服压力3.5

translation.en: [Mark] Come on, come on.
translation.zh: 加油

translation.en: -How's my time? -[Tanner] 23:57.
translation.zh:
-我还有多少时间？
-23分57秒

translation.en: Another six minutes, they won't have time to get back to us.
translation.zh: 只剩六分钟 他们不够时间回来了

translation.en: Blow the tethers. Let's go get 'em.
translation.zh: 发射拴链 我们去找他们

translation.en: If we go after them, we may not have enough fuel to get off the surface.
translation.zh:
如果去找他们
可能就会没有足够燃料起飞了

translation.en: Blow the goddamn tethers.
translation.zh: 发射他妈的拴链

translation.en: Mole 3 at depth. We're heading your way, Oren.
translation.zh:
鼹鼠三已抵达预定深度
我们将前进你所在位置

translation.en: [Tanner] Calculate exactly how much prop we need to get off this rock.
translation.zh:
算算我们需要多少动力
才能离开这个岩石

translation.en: We'll shut it down when we hit it. Will do.
translation.zh:
-达到该动力后就将它关闭
-好的

translation.en: [Oren] It opens up into a cave down here.
translation.zh: 它在下面打出了一个洞

translation.en: Mole got jammed against the side.
translation.zh: 鼹鼠的一边被卡住了

translation.en: [Gus] Okay, Fish, Team two at location four. Give me your hand.
translation.zh:
-菲斯 第二小队已抵达四号地点
-把你的手给我

translation.en: -What the hell happened? -I don't know. I don't know.
translation.zh:
-怎么回事？
-我不知道

translation.en: Everything was going great, and we got jammed up at 75 feet.
translation.zh: 一切都很正常 后来被卡在23米了

translation.en: Okay, hold up. [grunting]
translation.zh: 好 停下

translation.en: [Oren] All right, try backing it up. Roger that.
translation.zh:
-好 试着退出来
-明白

translation.en: -That's it. -[Tanner] A little more. A little more.
translation.zh:
-达到动力顶值了
-再等一会儿

translation.en: Shut it down. No, they always put extra in these tanks.
translation.zh:
-把它关上吧
-他们总会额外加些油的

translation.en: Fish, shut it down.
translation.zh: 菲斯 把它关上

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Come on, you bastard! Come on! Time!
translation.zh: 混蛋！快啊！时间？

translation.en: [Tanner] 1:02. Figured we'd better pick you kids up after school.
translation.zh:
1分2秒 我想我们得
接你们的孩子放学了

translation.en: [Tanner] Check your six, 100 yards.
translation.zh: 我们在6点钟方向 距离92米

translation.en: [Gus] I think we'd better hurry, boys.
translation.zh: 我想我们最好快点 小子们 （扫描）

translation.en: All right, it's going! It's going!
translation.zh: 好了！

translation.en: Mole's at 125 feet.
translation.zh: 鼹鼠位于38米处

translation.en: The sun's rising behind you. It's coming up fast.
translation.zh: 太阳正从你身后升起 快上来！

translation.en: Face shields down! Oh, Christ!
translation.zh:
-把面罩戴上！
-啊 天啊！

translation.en: Get the hell out of there!
translation.zh: 快离开这儿！

translation.en: Get your visor down!
translation.zh: 把你的面罩戴上！戴上！

translation.en: My eyes!
translation.zh: 我的眼睛！

translation.en: -[Mark] All right, we got him. -[Oren] Oh, God! My eyes!
translation.zh:
-好的 我们拉住他了
-天啊！我的眼睛！

translation.en: [Andrea] Oh, God, we're losing one.
translation.zh: 天啊！有人被吹飞了！

translation.en: He's got escape velocity, 1,000 feet and climbing.
translation.zh:
他上升的速度非常快
305米 持续上升中

translation.en: Mark, Mikhail, get the hell out of there!
translation.zh: 马克 赶快离开那儿！

translation.en: [Tanner] Firing primary thrusters.
translation.zh: 启动推进器

translation.en: -Payload doors still open. -Close 'em as we go.
translation.zh:
-弹药门仍开着
-边走边关

translation.en: [Tanner on TV] Houston, all moles are at depth. Nukes hot and ready.
translation.zh:
休斯敦 所有的鼹鼠就位
核弹已发热待发

translation.en: We lost Partenza to explosive outgassing. And Monash is injured.
translation.zh:
气体爆炸 我们失去了帕顿兹
蒙纳斯受伤了

translation.en: We have to go get Gus. [Tanner] There's no time for that.
translation.zh:
-我们得去找格斯
-没时间了

translation.en: Repressurize the cargo bay.
translation.zh: 给货舱重新加压

translation.en: He's going to die out there! We can still find him. He has a beacon.
translation.zh:
他要死了！
我们能找到他 他有信标

translation.en: [Tanner] I don't have time to argue with you. Just sit down, be quiet.
translation.zh:
我没时间跟你争论
安静坐下

translation.en: Turn on the fuckin' locator!
translation.zh: 打开定位器！

translation.en: We've used most of our propellant to get us out of the coma.
translation.zh:
我们使用了大量推进燃料
才得以离开彗星

translation.en: We can't just leave him. We have to go back.
translation.zh: 我们不能丢下他

translation.en: If we go back for Gus, we all die. We can't just leave him in space!
translation.zh:
-如果回去找格斯 所有人都会死
-我们不能把他丢在宇宙里！

translation.en: [whispering] Sit down, Mick. Sit down.
translation.zh: 坐下 麦克

translation.en: It's okay.
translation.zh: 没事的

translation.en: [Jenny] The Messiah has safely lifted off the comet.
translation.zh: 救世主号已经安全离开彗星

translation.en: But sadly, Gus Partenza has been lost.
translation.zh: 可悲的是我们失去了格斯帕顿兹

translation.en: Gus Partenza, a native of Harrisburg, Pennsylvania,
translation.zh:
格斯帕顿兹来自
宾夕法尼亚的哈里斯堡

translation.en: and graduate of Carnegie-Mellon University,
translation.zh: 毕业于卡内基梅隆大学

translation.en: joined the NASA space program
translation.zh: 完成杜克大学的医疗培训后不久

translation.en: shortly after completing his medical training at Duke University.
translation.zh: 他加入了NASA的航空计划 （格斯帕顿兹）

translation.en: Dr. Partenza was selected specifically for this mission,
translation.zh: 帕顿兹医生被挑选参加此任务

translation.en: not only for his medical expertise,
translation.zh: 不仅仅是因为他的医疗能力

translation.en: but also for his dedication to the advancement of space technology.
translation.zh: 也因为他致力于先进的航天技术

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: With the loss of Dr. Gus Partenza and with Oren Monash injured,
translation.zh:
在失去格斯医生
和奥伦受伤的情况下

translation.en: Captain Spurgeon Tanner is now in charge of the mission.
translation.zh: 斯波金船长现在负责指挥该任务

translation.en: The Messiah has successfully docked with the Orion-powered boosters
translation.zh:
救世主号成功对接了
猎户驱动的运载火箭

translation.en: and is now prepared to detonate the bombs planted on Wolf-Beiderman.
translation.zh:
正准备引爆
安放在沃尔夫比德曼彗星上的炸弹

translation.en: The Messiah's exterior-mounted camera will show us the detonation,
translation.zh:
救世主号的摄像机
将会拍摄到引爆场面

translation.en: but not before being temporarily blocked out by the nuclear blast.
translation.zh: 但在核爆炸烟雾散去之前将无法看清

translation.en: Once again, let me remind you, there is a 20-second delay,
translation.zh:
再次提醒各位
所显示的图像有二十秒的时间差

translation.en: so when the picture comes back to us,
translation.zh: 当画面重新出现时

translation.en: the comet should already have been knocked off its present course.
translation.zh: 彗星应该已被炸离目前的轨道

translation.en: [Tanner] Prepare to remove safeties and fire.
translation.zh: 准备打开保险栓进行点火

translation.en: [Mikhail] Safeties removed.
translation.zh: 保险栓已打开

translation.en: Weapons armed.
translation.zh: 武器准备完毕

translation.en: Three, two, one... Now.
translation.zh: 三、二、一 引爆

translation.en: [Jenny] So now we're just waiting for the picture to come back.
translation.zh: 现在我们将等待画面重新出现

translation.en: Decompression in area six.
translation.zh: 六区失压

translation.en: [Mark] Mick! I'll get the halon!
translation.zh: 麦克！ 我去拿灭火器！

translation.en: [man] Yes. I'm still here.
translation.zh: 是的 我仍在这儿

translation.en: [softly] ...even larger. We've lost contact with the Messiah.
translation.zh:
甚至更大
我们已经和救世主号失联了

translation.en: [man] We're live in ten seconds.
translation.zh: 我们十秒钟后实时直播

translation.en: Cue the president.
translation.zh: 对准总统

translation.en: Mr. President, five, four, three...
translation.zh: 总统先生 五、四、三…

translation.en: Hello, America.
translation.zh: 你好 美国民众

translation.en: It is my unhappy duty to report to you that the Messiah has failed.
translation.zh:
我很遗憾地告诉你们
救世主号任务失败

translation.en: This computer-enhanced radar image from Houston
translation.zh: 来自休斯敦的雷达图像

translation.en: shows how the detonation succeeded, however, did not destroy the comet.
translation.zh:
显示引爆是成功的
然而 没有摧毁彗星

translation.en: There are now two pieces. One six miles wide, the other, a mile and a half.
translation.zh:
现在它分成了两块 一块九千米宽
另一块两千米宽

translation.en: Both are still on a path towards Earth.
translation.zh: 两块都正向地球飞来

translation.en: We've lost communication with the Messiah spacecraft,
translation.zh: 我们与救世主号失去了联系

translation.en: although we continue to track it visually.
translation.zh: 虽然我们仍然能看到它

translation.en: We don't know how many are alive.
translation.zh: 可是不知道有多少人生还

translation.en: We don't know their condition.
translation.zh: 我们不知道他们的情况

translation.en: Now we have to make some decisions together.
translation.zh: 现在 我们得一起做出决定

translation.en: What do we do?
translation.zh: 我们该怎么办？

translation.en: You have a choice. We have a choice. Right now.
translation.zh:
你们有一个选择
我们有一个选择…现在

translation.en: Ever since the comet was discovered,
translation.zh: 自从彗星被发现之后

translation.en: we've been hoping and working for the best,
translation.zh: 我们希望并努力争取粉碎它

translation.en: but we've also been planning for the worst.
translation.zh: 可是我们也做了最坏的准备

translation.en: Our strategy has been twofold.
translation.zh: 我们的战略是双重准备

translation.en: First, our Strategic Missile Command is preparing to coordinate with the Russians
translation.zh:
我们的战略导弹行动
是准备与俄罗斯合作

translation.en: a massive strike of Titan missiles to intercept the comets.
translation.zh: 发射大量巨型导弹拦截彗星

translation.en: If we can deflect these comets enough,
translation.zh: 如果我们可以击偏这些彗星

translation.en: they will bounce harmlessly off our atmosphere
translation.zh: 它们就会无害地离开我们的大气层

translation.en: and head on out into space.
translation.zh: 朝宇宙飞去

translation.en: Unfortunately, the Titans cannot be launched
translation.zh: 不幸的是 巨型导弹只能在彗星

translation.en: until the comets are only a few hours away.
translation.zh: 离我们几小时远时发射

translation.en: And while we are confident the missile attack will succeed,
translation.zh: 我们虽然有信心导弹攻击会获得成功

translation.en: it is only prudent that we now take cautionary steps
translation.zh: 为谨慎起见 我们也采取了必要措施

translation.en: to ensure the continuation of our way of life.
translation.zh: 来确保我们的生活能继续

translation.en: To guarantee that there will be enough of us left
translation.zh:
确保有足够的人幸存
来建立一个新世界

translation.en: to rebuild a new world in the unlikely event that the comets do strike the Earth.
translation.zh: 如果彗星撞击地球

translation.en: So in the soft limestone of Missouri,
translation.zh: 所以我们在密苏里的软石灰岩中

translation.en: we've been preparing a network of immense caves,
translation.zh: 准备了一个巨大的山洞网络

translation.en: and they're almost finished.
translation.zh: 现在差不多完工了

translation.en: And we can put a million people in them.
translation.zh: 那里可以容纳一百万人

translation.en: And that million people can survive there, underground, for two years,
translation.zh: 这一百万人可以在地下存活两年

translation.en: until the air clears and the dust settles.
translation.zh: 直到空气和灰尘净化时再出来

translation.en: Now, the cave is more than a dormitory.
translation.zh: 现在 山洞不仅仅是个宿舍

translation.en: It's our new Noah's Ark.
translation.zh: 也是我们新的诺亚方舟

translation.en: We're storing seeds and seedlings, plants, animals, enough to start over.
translation.zh:
我们储存种子和禾苗
动植物 足以重新开始生活

translation.en: On August 10th, a computer will randomly select 800,000 Americans
translation.zh:
8月10日 电脑将随意
选出八十万美国人

translation.en: to join the 200,000 scientists, doctors, engineers,
translation.zh:
加入到特别选出的二十万
科学家、医生、工程师

translation.en: teachers, soldiers, and artists who have already been chosen.
translation.zh: 教师、战士和艺术家中去

translation.en: Other countries are preparing similar caves
translation.zh: 其他国家也在准备相似的山洞

translation.en: along whatever lines they feel are best to preserve their way of life.
translation.zh:
按照他们自己的想法
去保存他们最好的生活

translation.en: This is ours.
translation.zh: 这是我们的

translation.en: Beginning tonight and continuing until the crisis passes,
translation.zh: 从今晚开始一直到危机结束

translation.en: I am declaring a state of martial law.
translation.zh: 我宣布国家处于戒严状态

translation.en: The armed forces and the national guard are working with local law enforcement.
translation.zh:
武装军队和国民警卫
将与当地法律机构协作

translation.en: A national curfew begins at midnight tonight.
translation.zh: 今晚半夜起全国开始宵禁

translation.en: Now, wherever you are, go home.
translation.zh: 现在 不管你在哪儿 请快回家

translation.en: Stay off the roads after sunset.
translation.zh: 日落后不要外出

translation.en: Crimes against persons or property will be dealt with swiftly and harshly.
translation.zh:
人身或财务犯罪行为
将会得到快速严厉的惩罚

translation.en: News stations around the nation are being faxed copies of the lottery procedure as we speak,
translation.zh:
全国的广播机构正在接收
人员挑选程序的传真

translation.en: and they'll be broadcasting the details to you in a few moments.
translation.zh: 等会他们将向你们公布细节

translation.en: I wish...
translation.zh: 我希望…

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: Wishing is wrong.
translation.zh: 希望是不对的

translation.en: It's the wrong word right now. That's not what I mean.
translation.zh: 这个词现在用不对 我不是那个意思

translation.en: What I mean is...
translation.zh: 我的意思是…

translation.en: I believe in God.
translation.zh: 我相信上帝

translation.en: Relax.
translation.zh: 别着急

translation.en: [President Beck] I know a lot of you don't,
translation.zh: 我知道很多你们不知道的事情

translation.en: but I still want to offer a prayer, for our survival.
translation.zh: 但我仍将为我们能幸存下来而祈祷

translation.en: Mine included.
translation.zh: 包括我自己在内

translation.en: Because I believe that God, whomever you hold that to be,
translation.zh: 因为我相信上帝 无论是谁幸存下来

translation.en: hears all prayers, even if sometimes the answer is no.
translation.zh:
都会听到所有的祈祷
即使有时回答是否定的

translation.en: So may the Lord bless you.
translation.zh: 因此 愿上帝保佑你们

translation.en: May the Lord keep you.
translation.zh: 愿上帝保存你们

translation.en: May the Lord lift up his divine countenance upon you,
translation.zh: 愿上帝向你们赐予神恩

translation.en: and give you peace.
translation.zh: 给予你们和平

translation.en: [woman] And in five, four, three, two...
translation.zh: 五、四、三、二…

translation.en: We now have the details for the national lottery.
translation.zh: 我们已获得全国民众抽选程序细节 （华盛顿 詹妮莱纳）

translation.en: Those of you who have been preselected
translation.zh: （诺亚方舟全国抽选程序公告） 特选人员会在几分钟后收到通知

translation.en: will be notified within the next few minutes.
translation.zh: 特选人员会在几分钟后收到通知

translation.en: For the rest, on the night of August 10th,
translation.zh: 其余的人 在8月10号夜里

translation.en: those whose Social Security numbers
translation.zh: 其社保号码被电脑随机选中的人

translation.en: have been randomly selected by computer will be notified.
translation.zh: 其社保号码被电脑随机选中的人 将会收到通知

translation.en: While some Americans over 50 years of age
translation.zh: 一些超过五十岁的美国人

translation.en: have been preselected for the Ark
translation.zh: 被选入方舟

translation.en: due to their expertise in a necessary field of study,
translation.zh: 这是因为我们需要他们的专业知识

translation.en: no men and women over 50 in the general population
translation.zh: 超过五十岁的普通男女大众

translation.en: will be included in the lottery.
translation.zh: 不会包括在随机挑选之列

translation.en: The... The evac...the evacuation of those who have been selected for the Ark
translation.zh: 转移被选入方舟人员的行动时间

translation.en: will take no longer than two days, beginning on August 12th.
translation.zh: 不会超过两天 从8月12号开始

translation.en: During this two-day period, no unofficial travel will be permitted.
translation.zh: 在这两天内 不允许外出旅行

translation.en: Those selected will be taken by bus and train
translation.zh: 入选人员将乘坐汽车或火车

translation.en: to the underground Ark site by military personnel.
translation.zh: 由军人带到地下方舟那里

translation.en: Civil defense teams have been formed in every town
translation.zh: 超过五千人的城镇

translation.en: with a population over 5,000.
translation.zh: 都组成了民防队伍

translation.en: They will distribute supplies and organize group shelters in underground parking facilities
translation.zh: 他们将分送供给到地下停车场等设施

translation.en: and other appropriate sites.
translation.zh: 组织分组避难

translation.en: -Construction plans -[phone rings] equipment lists,
translation.zh: 准备建筑计划、设备货单

translation.en: and locations for securing the necessary provisions...
translation.zh: 以及必需品的地点…

translation.en: [Ellen] Hello?
translation.zh: 喂？

translation.en: -...along with information... -Yes, this is Ellen Beiderman. ...on how to grow your own food underground
translation.zh: 喂 我是埃伦比德曼

translation.en: and how to purify water
translation.zh: …如何净化水

translation.en: are now available on the Internet...
translation.zh: 现在可以上网查询…

translation.en: -We've been preselected. -at www.fcda.gov.
translation.zh:
-我们是特选人员
-www.fcda.gov 政府…

translation.en: Chuck? Chuck? Where are you going?
translation.zh: 查克？你去哪？

translation.en: Our phone. They could be calling. ...beginning on August 9th.
translation.zh:
-接电话 可能会给我们打电话
-从8月9日开始

translation.en: The only phones that ring will be those of the people selected.
translation.zh:
唯一能响的电话
是那些特选人员的电话

translation.en: That's it.
translation.zh: 公告完毕

translation.en: That's all there is.
translation.zh: 所有公告已播报完毕

translation.en: [Tanner] The interior camera circuitry is shot.
translation.zh: 内部摄像机电路短路

translation.en: So, Andy, can we get back into the cargo bay to reroute the video functions?
translation.zh: 我们能进入货舱重装录像线路吗？

translation.en: [Andrea] Starboard cargo porthole's blown.
translation.zh: 货舱舷窗被炸掉了

translation.en: We could go in with the EVAs, but there's not much left in the life-support packs.
translation.zh:
我们能穿航天服进入
可是没有多少救生物资了

translation.en: [Mark] We should be able to raise Houston on the low band once we get closer.
translation.zh:
一旦我们靠近低频带
应该能与休斯敦联系

translation.en: And the Orion is still functioning?
translation.zh: 猎户还能用吗？

translation.en: System check was okay, but I don't know about the radiation shielding.
translation.zh:
是的 可是不知道
辐射屏蔽物怎么样了

translation.en: So if we fire it up, we beat the comet back to Earth,
translation.zh:
所以 如果我们点火
就会把彗星推回地球

translation.en: but we may end up glowing in the dark. [laughing] Right?
translation.zh:
可是我们的下场
可能是在黑暗里发光 对吧？

translation.en: Okay, so, uh... Anybody?
translation.zh: 好 那么…怎么样？

translation.en: Let's go home.
translation.zh: 我们回家吧

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: [Robin] I have to say it's liberating
translation.zh: 知道不会接到电话真是解放了

translation.en: knowing that I'm not going to be called.
translation.zh: 知道不会接到电话真是解放了 （距离撞击时间：四星期零两天）

translation.en: I don't think I've ever been happier.
translation.zh: （距离撞击时间：四星期零两天） 我想我从来没有这么高兴

translation.en: I've even stopped smoking.
translation.zh: 我不吸烟了

translation.en: What are you gonna do with all that extra money you save?
translation.zh: 你省下的这部分钱打算怎么用？

translation.en: Do you know the National Gallery is saving all of the art?
translation.zh:
你知道国家画廊
正在收藏其所有的艺术品吗？

translation.en: They're shipping it to the caves.
translation.zh: 他们要运到山洞里

translation.en: I've given them my beautiful 18th century desk from New England and all the Sheraton silver.
translation.zh:
我把从英国带来的18世纪的
桌子和谢拉顿银器都给了他们

translation.en: I really feel like I'd protected something when I gave them.
translation.zh:
我给他们的时候
真有保护文物的感觉

translation.en: [chuckles] You should see my apartment. There's nothing there.
translation.zh:
你该去看看我的公寓
里面什么也没有了

translation.en: It's practically Japanese.
translation.zh: 典型的日本公寓

translation.en: Seems kind of unfair that I got picked.
translation.zh: 我入选看起来不太公平

translation.en: You know, I'm not a doctor or a scientist.
translation.zh: 你知道 我不是医生或科学家

translation.en: People need continuity.
translation.zh: 人类要继续生存

translation.en: Everyone knows you.
translation.zh: 大家都认识你

translation.en: And they trust you.
translation.zh: 他们都信任你

translation.en: But I can't help you.
translation.zh: 可是我…不能帮助你

translation.en: Don't worry about me.
translation.zh: 别担心我

translation.en: I'm gonna be happy as long as I know you're going to live.
translation.zh: 知道你会幸存我就很高兴

translation.en: Mr. Hotchner?
translation.zh: 哈奇尼先生？

translation.en: Who did I think I was going to be when I bought that bike?
translation.zh: 我买那辆车时 不知道自己会怎样

translation.en: Well, every kid on the block wants one now.
translation.zh: 附近的每个男孩 现在都想要一辆

translation.en: Every parent on the block hates you for it.
translation.zh: 附近孩子的父母都为此而恨你

translation.en: Thank you, Leo. That's the best news I've had in years. Um, sir?
translation.zh:
-这是近来我听到的最好消息
-先生？

translation.en: Could you give me a hand over here for a second?
translation.zh: 你能帮我一下吗？

translation.en: -Yes, sir. -I just want to get these bars up.
translation.zh:
-好的 先生
-我想把这些加固

translation.en: -Hello, Mrs. Hotchner. -Hi, Leo.
translation.zh:
-你好 哈奇尼太太
-你好

translation.en: [Jenny on TV] A mob attacked and killed a Miami rental yard operator
translation.zh:
公众暴动
杀死了一名迈阿密租车场职员

translation.en: who was charging $5,000 an hour for backhoe and tractor rentals.
translation.zh:
因租用一小时挖土机和拖拉机
他要收取五千美元

translation.en: [Chuck] Same old crap on the TV. I'm really sick of it, you know?
translation.zh: 电视上说的总是那些 我听腻了

translation.en: -Mrs. Hotchner? -Sarah's on the hill.
translation.zh:
-哈奇尼太太？
-萨拉在山上

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Where were you today?
translation.zh: 你今天在哪儿？

translation.en: I've been looking all over for you.
translation.zh: 我到处找你

translation.en: Why weren't you at school?
translation.zh: 你为什么没去上学？

translation.en: My dad said I didn't have to go. He said there's no point.
translation.zh: 我爸爸说不用去了 他说没有必要

translation.en: I talked to civil defense.
translation.zh: 我跟民间防卫队谈过了

translation.en: They said if you and I got married we'd be family, and I could get you in.
translation.zh:
他们说如果我们结婚就是一个家庭
我可以让你进方舟

translation.en: Well, what about my parents? They're not your family.
translation.zh: 那我的父母呢？他们不是你的家人

translation.en: -I don't want to go without my parents. -You don't have to.
translation.zh: 我不想把他们扔下

translation.en: I'm the famous Leo Beiderman,
translation.zh:
你可以带着他们
我是著名的利奥比德曼

translation.en: and I haven't used my fame for anything. But I got them to let your family go too.
translation.zh:
我还没用过我的名字呢
我要让他们接受你的家人

translation.en: You... This is your only chance to survive.
translation.zh: 你…这是你唯一生存的机会

translation.en: [Jenny on TV] Across the country, looters continue to set fire to abandoned stores.
translation.zh:
在全国各地
抢劫犯继续放火烧毁遗弃的商店

translation.en: The fires have been left to burn since many firefighters have been called to help prepare shelters.
translation.zh:
因大批消防员被调往准备掩护所
大火肆意猖獗

translation.en: Throughout Latin America's major cities,
translation.zh: 在拉丁美洲的主要城市里

translation.en: business districts have been abandoned to looting gangs.
translation.zh: 商业区惨遭遗弃 成了抢劫团伙目标

translation.en: Emergency airlifts have been ruled out as too dangerous.
translation.zh: 紧急空运已暂停 因为太危险了

translation.en: More street fighting in Moscow as food and fuel shortages continue.
translation.zh:
莫斯科食品燃料持续短缺
街巷打斗升级

translation.en: [priest] "...believes all things, hopes all things, endures all things.
translation.zh:
…相信一切
对一切寄予希望 忍受所有悲哀

translation.en: When I was a child, I spoke like a child,
translation.zh: 当我是个孩子时 我说话像个孩子

translation.en: I thought like a child, I reasoned like a child.
translation.zh:
我的想法像个孩子
我看待事情像个孩子

translation.en: When I became a man, I gave up childish ways.
translation.zh: 当我成年时 我不再孩子气了

translation.en: For now, we see in a mirror dimly, but then face to face.
translation.zh:
现在我们在镜子里朦胧相望
然后我们将面对面

translation.en: Now I know in part, then I shall understand fully,
translation.zh: 现在我知道一点就能理解全部

translation.en: even as I have been fully understood."
translation.zh: 就像我完全知道了一样

translation.en: Do you, Leo, take Sarah to be your wife,
translation.zh: 利奥 你原意娶萨拉为妻…

translation.en: to have and to hold from this day forward,
translation.zh: 利奥 你原意娶萨拉为妻… 从今天起…

translation.en: for better, for worse,
translation.zh: 从今天起…

translation.en: for richer, for poorer,
translation.zh: 无论生老病死…

translation.en: to love and to cherish?
translation.zh: 无论富贵贫穷… 都会爱惜她、珍重她吗？

translation.en: I now pronounce you husband and wife.
translation.zh: 我现在宣布你们正式结为夫妻

translation.en: Here, let me help you. I'll get it.
translation.zh: 来 我来帮你 我来拿开

translation.en: Yeah. How you feeling?
translation.zh: 好 你觉得怎么样？

translation.en: -Fine. -I want to tell you something.
translation.zh:
-不错
-我想告诉你一件事

translation.en: You children didn't bring any real books to read, did you know that?
translation.zh: 你们这些孩子 没有带真正的书来读

translation.en: I brought Moby Dick and Huckleberry Finn
translation.zh:
我带来了《白鲸》
还有《哈克贝利费恩历险记》

translation.en: and Baker and Simon had never read them.
translation.zh: 贝克和西蒙 从未读过这些

translation.en: Now, I'm afraid to ask you,
translation.zh: 现在 我恐怕要问你

translation.en: have you ever read Melville or Twain?
translation.zh: 你读过梅尔维尔和吐温吗？

translation.en: Hey, I'm a child of the movies, Fish.
translation.zh: 我是个电影迷 菲斯

translation.en: Okay, I see.
translation.zh: 好 我知道了

translation.en: So...
translation.zh: 所以…

translation.en: You got a shitty deal, Oren, you know that?
translation.zh: 你的情况不妙 奥伦 你知道吗？

translation.en: You truly did.
translation.zh:
-真的很不妙
-别为我担心

translation.en: -Don't worry about me. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-真的很不妙
-别为我担心 -好
-我是说真的

translation.en: I mean that. Really.
translation.zh:
-好
-我是说真的

translation.en: Don't worry about me.
translation.zh: 别为我担心

translation.en: My whole life I...
translation.zh: 我的整个人生…

translation.en: You know how it is for guys like us.
translation.zh: 你知道我们这样的人会怎样

translation.en: You... you and I, we're the same.
translation.zh: 你和我 我们都一样

translation.en: What do you mean by that? [chuckles]
translation.zh: 你这是什么意思？

translation.en: Gotta be the best. Oh, I see.
translation.zh:
-要做到最好
-我明白了

translation.en: Be the best.
translation.zh: 做到…最好

translation.en: Sometimes I see flashes of light.
translation.zh: 有时我看到闪光…

translation.en: You know, like colors.
translation.zh: 你知道…就像…颜色

translation.en: I fall asleep.
translation.zh: 我睡着了…

translation.en: And I dream.
translation.zh: 我做梦了

translation.en: But there's a part of me that's always awake.
translation.zh: 可是我身体的一部分总是醒着

translation.en: And I can see myself dreaming.
translation.zh: 我可以看到自己在做梦

translation.en: I'm seeing things differently, Fish. That's good. That's good.
translation.zh:
-我看东西不一样了 菲斯
-嗯 那很好

translation.en: Fish...
translation.zh: 菲斯…

translation.en: Why the hell do they call you "Fish"?
translation.zh: 他们为什么叫你菲斯呢？

translation.en: [laughs] Well, I...
translation.zh: 嗯 我…

translation.en: Spurgeon, sturgeon, fish.
translation.zh: 斯波金 斯德金 菲斯

translation.en: I mean, it took about 15 minutes of my first day at the naval academy.
translation.zh: 第一天我在海军军校花了15分钟

translation.en: Yeah. Your kids go there?
translation.zh: 是吗？你的孩子上军校吗？

translation.en: Yeah, they did. They did.
translation.zh: 是的 他们上过

translation.en: And they're good men, both of them.
translation.zh: 他们都是好孩子 两个都是

translation.en: I don't see as much of them as I used to when Mary was alive.
translation.zh: 玛丽在世时 我常常去看他们

translation.en: You don't have to talk about it. It's okay. No, it's okay. It's okay.
translation.zh:
-你不必谈这些的 没什么
-对 没什么

translation.en: You're a married man, you know what it's like.
translation.zh: 你结过婚 知道会是什么样的

translation.en: I mean, every marriage has its good years and its bad years.
translation.zh: 你结过婚 知道会是什么样的 每段婚姻都有蜜月和风波

translation.en: We ended on a great year.
translation.zh: 我们分手时很幸福

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Anyway, let's get started.
translation.zh: 不管怎样 我们开始吧

translation.en: Moby Dick, chapter one.
translation.zh: 《白鲸》 第一章

translation.en: "Call me Ishmael.
translation.zh: “叫我以实玛利吧

translation.en: Several years ago, never mind how long precisely,
translation.zh: 几年之前 别管到底是几年

translation.en: having little or no money in my purse..." "Whenever I find myself growing grim about the mouth,
translation.zh: 钱包里没钱或只有很少的钱 挨着饿

translation.en: whenever it is a damp, drizzly November in my soul,
translation.zh:
每当我心里感受到
悲哀、雨蒙蒙的十一月

translation.en: whenever I find myself..."
translation.zh: 每当我发现我撞掉别人的帽子时

translation.en: "...knocking people's hats off, then I account it high time
translation.zh: 每当我发现我撞掉别人的帽子时 我就认为我该马上去大海了”

translation.en: to get to sea as soon as I can."
translation.zh: 我就认为我该马上去大海了”

translation.en: -[soldier 1] Listen up! -[soldier 2] Hold it right there!
translation.zh:
-听着！
-待那儿别动！

translation.en: -Beiderman? -Yeah, that's us.
translation.zh: 比德曼？

translation.en: -IDs, please. -[Don] Yeah. Got them right here.
translation.zh:
-请出示身份证
-好 就在这儿

translation.en: There's four of us. Lewis?
translation.zh:
-我们一共四个人
-刘易斯？

translation.en: This is my wife, Sarah. We have a marriage license. Um, I have it right here.
translation.zh:
这是我妻子萨拉
我们有结婚证 就在这儿

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: All right. Let's go. Let's move it out!
translation.zh: 好 我们走！

translation.en: Mom. Wait. Sir, my parents are coming too.
translation.zh:
-妈妈？先生 我父母也要来
-等等！哈奇尼夫妇

translation.en: Wait, wait, the Hotchners. The Hotchners are coming too.
translation.zh:
-妈妈？先生 我父母也要来
-等等！哈奇尼夫妇 哈奇…

translation.en: H-O-T-C...
translation.zh: 哈奇…

translation.en: [Leo] H-N-E-R.
translation.zh: …尼

translation.en: [soldier] No. It's not here.
translation.zh:
-不在这儿
-应该在这儿

translation.en: No, no. It has to be there. FCDA sent their names to the White House.
translation.zh:
-不在这儿
-应该在这儿 他们的名字已被送入白宫

translation.en: -[soldier] They're not there. -[Don] Just check the goddamn list again.
translation.zh:
-这里没有
-再查一下

translation.en: -[Don] Leo, give me your bag. -[Ellen] They must be there. -[Sarah] Look closely. -[Don] Ellen, give me your bag, sweetie.
translation.zh:
-他们一定在这儿
-把你的包给我 宝贝

translation.en: [soldier] No. They're not on the list.
translation.zh: 他们不在名单上 对不起

translation.en: -[Sarah] Wait, wait. -I'm sorry. Let's go! We have to go!
translation.zh: 他们不在名单上 对不起 先生！你能不能再查一下？

translation.en: -[Ellen] You don't understand. -Can you check it one more time?
translation.zh: 先生！你能不能再查一下？

translation.en: I put you on the list. They said your names were on the list.
translation.zh:
我把你们放在名单上
他们说你们在名单上

translation.en: Sarah, I put them on the list. We're not on the list.
translation.zh:
-我把他们放在名单上了！
-我们不在名单上

translation.en: [soldier] I need the Beidermans on the bus now.
translation.zh: 我要比德曼现在上车

translation.en: -Dad, I want to stay with you. -What? -No, no, no. We have to go. -Leo, let's get her on the bus.
translation.zh:
-爸爸 我要跟你们在一起
-不！

translation.en: [Sarah] Yes, I need to stay with you. Sarah! Sarah, you need to go.
translation.zh:
-我要跟你们在一起！
-萨拉 你必须走

translation.en: No. I have to stay with you, Dad. [Leo] I'm not going anywhere without you!
translation.zh:
-我要跟你们在一起
-没有你们我不走！

translation.en: [Chuck] Sarah, you don't know what you're doing. Come or stay, young lady, this bus is moving out.
translation.zh:
-宝贝儿 上车吧！
-年轻女士 车要开了

translation.en: Son, on the bus! Get on the bus!
translation.zh: 上车！快上车！

translation.en: [soldier] Let's go.
translation.zh: 走吧

translation.en: Chuck, we'll work it out when we get there.
translation.zh: 查克 我们到了再说

translation.en: -[Jeff] What's that, the crates? -Jenny, there's a phone call for you.
translation.zh: 詹妮？有电话找你

translation.en: Yes?
translation.zh: 谁？

translation.en: This is she.
translation.zh: 我是詹妮

translation.en: It's Robin Lerner. My mother.
translation.zh: 罗宾莱纳 我的母亲

translation.en: When?
translation.zh: 什么时候？

translation.en: I'll come down there then. Thank you.
translation.zh: 我会过去的 谢谢

translation.en: Thank you very much.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: Jenny, do you want us to do something?
translation.zh: 詹妮 我们能做点什么吗？

translation.en: You're too late. I already took care of everything.
translation.zh: 你来得太晚了 我已经都处理好了

translation.en: Come, come. Inside the car. You're getting sick. Please.
translation.zh: 来吧 上车 你会生病的

translation.en: I want to talk to you.
translation.zh: 我要跟你谈谈

translation.en: Please, come.
translation.zh: 上车来吧

translation.en: I don't give a shit.
translation.zh: 我不在乎

translation.en: Go home and tell it to Chloe. I can't. She left me.
translation.zh:
-回家跟克洛伊说吧
-不可能了 她走了

translation.en: She's with her mother. They both got scared.
translation.zh: 她跟她母亲在一起 她们都吓坏了

translation.en: Come. I want to talk to you. I need you.
translation.zh: 我要跟你谈谈 我需要你

translation.en: How does it feel?
translation.zh: 你感觉怎么样？

translation.en: I feel like an orphan.
translation.zh: 我觉得像个孤儿

translation.en: Jenny! Jenny!
translation.zh: 詹妮！

translation.en: Stop.
translation.zh: 停车

translation.en: Welcome to the Ark. I'm section leader for Orange 254.
translation.zh:
欢迎来到方舟
我是254橙色区的负责人

translation.en: Remember that. That's where you'll be calling home the next two years.
translation.zh: 这是你们未来两年的家

translation.en: So gather your things and follow me to the orientation gallery.
translation.zh: 收拾一下东西跟我去集合大厅

translation.en: [man on PA] If you have been designated as a civilian section officer,
translation.zh: 如果你被指定为民间部门官员

translation.en: report to section Red 116 upon entering.
translation.zh: 进入后请到116红区报到

translation.en: Once again, if you have been designated as a civilian section officer,
translation.zh:
重复一次
如果你被指定为民间部门官员

translation.en: report to section Red 116 upon entering.
translation.zh: 进入后请到116红区报到

translation.en: [Don] Leo...
translation.zh: 利奥

translation.en: I'm not coming.
translation.zh: 我不去了

translation.en: Leo, come with us right now. I have to go back for Sarah.
translation.zh:
-利奥 快跟我们来
-我得回到萨拉身边

translation.en: -[Ellen] Leo -Mom, I'm going.
translation.zh:
-利奥…
-妈妈 我走了

translation.en: [Ellen] Don, what are you doing? I'm giving him something to trade. That's what I'm doing.
translation.zh:
-你在干什么？
-给他点东西做交易

translation.en: -I want you to take this. -Dad, that's enough.
translation.zh:
-我要你拿着这个
-爸爸 够了！

translation.en: [crying] Goddamn it. You take care of yourself, okay?
translation.zh: 该死 你要照顾好自己 好吗？

translation.en: I'm gonna make it.
translation.zh: 我不会有事的

translation.en: What about Entrekin?
translation.zh: 埃特金怎么办？

translation.en: I don't know. He hasn't returned my call in over two weeks.
translation.zh: 我不知道 他两个星期没回我电话了

translation.en: -Excuse me, Jenny? -Yeah?
translation.zh:
-詹妮？
-什么？

translation.en: Your father's here.
translation.zh: 你父亲来了

translation.en: Hello. Hello.
translation.zh:
-你好
-你好

translation.en: I can't stay long. I'm leaving the city, but I wanted to show you something.
translation.zh:
我不能待很久 我要出城了
可是我要给你看一样东西

translation.en: I wanted to show you that you're not an orphan.
translation.zh: 我要给你看 你不是孤儿

translation.en: I have proof that you're not an orphan.
translation.zh: 我有证据你不是个孤儿

translation.en: Here.
translation.zh: 这里

translation.en: Look.
translation.zh: 瞧

translation.en: Where's Mom?
translation.zh: 妈妈在哪儿？

translation.en: Behind the camera.
translation.zh: 在照相机后面

translation.en: -She took this? -Mmm-hmm. And this one too.
translation.zh:
-这是她照的？
-这张也是

translation.en: She was such an artist, don't you think so?
translation.zh: 她照得很好 是不是？

translation.en: You don't remember when we take them, hmm?
translation.zh: 你不记得是什么时候照的吗？

translation.en: I'm five years old. How would I remember that?
translation.zh: 我只有五岁 怎么会记得？

translation.en: Some people do remember when they were five years old.
translation.zh: 有些人五岁就记得事情了

translation.en: It was such a beautiful day.
translation.zh: 那天天气很好

translation.en: All alone on the beach.
translation.zh: 只有我们在海滩上

translation.en: And, of course, she would have been in the picture,
translation.zh: 当然 她应该在照片里

translation.en: but there was no one else to hold the camera,
translation.zh: 可是没别人能给我们照相

translation.en: and she insisted.
translation.zh: 她…她坚持她来拍…

translation.en: You know how she is.
translation.zh: 你知道她的脾气

translation.en: How she was.
translation.zh: 她那时就那样

translation.en: Jenny...
translation.zh: 詹妮

translation.en: It was such a good day for all of us.
translation.zh: 那天我们大家都很高兴

translation.en: Don't you remember?
translation.zh: 你不记得吗？

translation.en: Keep them.
translation.zh: 留下这些照片

translation.en: Goodbye.
translation.zh: 再见

translation.en: [man on radio] We have now confirmed the launch of all the Titan missiles
translation.zh: 我们接到通知 所有巨型导弹

translation.en: from their positions in North Dakota and Wyoming.
translation.zh: 都会从北达科他和怀俄明基地发射出

translation.en: The comets are now approximately 14 hours
translation.zh: 彗星现在离大气层

translation.en: outside of Earth's atmosphere,
translation.zh: 大约还有14个小时

translation.en: and we are told it should take these missiles
translation.zh: 我们得知导弹可以

translation.en: less than 20 minutes to reach their target.
translation.zh: 在20分钟之内到达目标

translation.en: Okay, here's what we're looking at.
translation.zh: 好 这就是我们所看到的

translation.en: All of the Titans have been launched.
translation.zh: 所有的巨型导弹都发射出去了

translation.en: We still won't know if they've made a difference.
translation.zh: 可我们仍不知道它们会不会起作用

translation.en: The comets have to travel for a while
translation.zh: 在雷达跟踪站能够看到之前

translation.en: before the radar tracking stations can see
translation.zh: 彗星要飞行一阵子

translation.en: if they've been pushed to a safe course that'll bypass the Earth.
translation.zh:
如果彗星被推入安全的轨道
那它们就会绕过地球

translation.en: So one more time, we have to wait.
translation.zh: 因此 我们得再次等待

translation.en: Are we on? [man] We're on, Mr. President.
translation.zh:
-我们可以开始了吗？
-可以开始了 总统先生

translation.en: Our missiles have failed.
translation.zh: 我们的导弹失败了

translation.en: The comets are still headed for Earth
translation.zh: 彗星继续向地球挺进…

translation.en: and there's nothing we can do to stop them.
translation.zh: 我们没有办法阻止它们

translation.en: So this is it.
translation.zh: 那么 是时候了

translation.en: If the world does go on,
translation.zh: 如果世界将继续…

translation.en: it will not go on for everyone.
translation.zh: 那也不是对每个人而言

translation.en: [President Beck on TV] We have now been able to calculate the comets' final trajectories,
translation.zh: 我们现在能够算出彗星最后的轨道

translation.en: and we have determined where they're going to strike.
translation.zh: 我们已经知道它们将撞在何处

translation.en: The smaller of the two comets, Beiderman, will hit first,
translation.zh: 那块较小的 比德曼 将首先撞击

translation.en: somewhere along the Atlantic seaboard
translation.zh: 大约在大西洋海岸某处

translation.en: probably in the waters off the coast of Cape Hatteras
translation.zh: 可能在哈特拉斯角附近的水域

translation.en: in just under 12 hours at 4:35 p.m. Eastern Daylight Time.
translation.zh:
时间是12小时后
东白昼时间4点35分

translation.en: The impact of the comet is going to be...
translation.zh: 彗星的影响将…

translation.en: well, disastrous.
translation.zh: 非常惨重

translation.en: There will be a very large tidal wave
translation.zh: 将会有很大的巨浪

translation.en: moving quickly through the Atlantic Ocean.
translation.zh: 迅速横跨大西洋
